LanguageData.EjectAllDesc: Eject all stored soul stones onto the ground.
LanguageData.AllowAllGenepacksDesc: Allow colonists to automatically store any soul stones in this container. If you want only specific soul stones to be stored here, please disable this option.
LanguageData.ContainedGenepacksDesc: Soul stones currently inside this container.
LanguageData.GenepacksToLoadDesc: Soul stones designated to be loaded into this container.
LanguageData.GenepacksIgnoredDesc: Soul stones not designated to be loaded into this container.
LanguageData.EjectGenepackDesc: Eject soul stones from this container.
